alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:51AM CDT until June 07 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1051 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cedarville, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Van Buren... Cedarville... Natural Dam... Alma... Rudy... Figure Five... Lee Creek... Short... Concord... Uniontown... Dora... Furry... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 6, and between mile markers 8 and 11. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
